item.title: A Polar coordinate system represents syntax in large language models
item.description: LLMs spontaneously encode syntax using a polar coordinate system, representing syntactic relations via relative direction and distance of word embeddings.

item.title: CALVIN: Improved Contextual Video Captioning via Instruction Tuning
item.description: CALVIN: Instruction tuning boosts contextual video captioning, achieving state-of-the-art results!

item.title: FlowLLM: Flow Matching for Material Generation with Large Language Models as Base Distributions
item.description: FlowLLM revolutionizes material design by cleverly merging large language models and Riemannian flow matching, yielding a 300% boost in stable material generation!

item.title: Global Lyapunov functions: a long-standing open problem in mathematics, with symbolic transformers
item.description: AI-powered sequence-to-sequence transformers surpass human and algorithmic abilities in discovering Lyapunov functions for dynamical systems, solving a long-standing open problem in mathematics.

item.title: Iteration Head: A Mechanistic Study of Chain-of-Thought
item.description: Researchers reveal how Chain-of-Thought reasoning emerges in transformers via specialized ‘iteration heads’, improving LLM performance and offering insights into mechanistic interpretability.

item.title: Megalodon: Efficient LLM Pretraining and Inference with Unlimited Context Length
item.description: MEGALODON: A new neural architecture for LLMs, enabling unlimited context length with improved efficiency and accuracy.

item.title: Meta 3D AssetGen: Text-to-Mesh Generation with High-Quality Geometry, Texture, and PBR Materials
item.description: Meta 3D AssetGen: High-quality text-to-mesh generation with realistic PBR materials and lighting, exceeding prior methods in speed and accuracy.

item.title: No Free Delivery Service: Epistemic limits of passive data collection in complex social systems
item.description: Passive data collection in complex social systems invalidates standard AI model validation; new methods are needed.

item.title: Rainbow Teaming: Open-Ended Generation of Diverse Adversarial Prompts
item.description: Rainbow Teaming: a novel black-box approach generates diverse adversarial prompts to enhance LLM robustness and safety, achieving over 90% attack success rate across various models.

item.title: Stochastic Optimal Control Matching
item.description: Stochastic Optimal Control Matching (SOCM) significantly reduces errors in stochastic optimal control by learning a matching vector field using a novel iterative diffusion optimization technique.
